metadata.title: ARCTIC ARGOS Drifter Data Collated under ESDIM Data Rescue

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: CTD: Argos Drifters were deployed in the Western Arctic and Greenland Sea to assess sea ice drift and current regimes. High resolution time series data includes zonal and meridonal currents, drifter velocity, barometric pressure and air temperature measurements. Drifter data was collected hourly.
